p.dialogue: "Greetings! I'm Demetrius, local scientist and father. Thanks for introducing yourself!#$e#I'm studying the local plants and animals from my home laboratory.#$b#Have you met my daughter Maru? She's interested to meet you."
"I already spotted a rare crab. This place is great.$h"
"I'll be analyzing this data for months."
"*crunch*... whoops, there goes an endangered crab species...$s#$b#...#$b#Oh, nevermind. It was just the empty shell! I can sleep tonight."
"Are you having fun, @? You need to remember to take breaks now and then too!"
"I usually don't partake... but I'm usually not on a tropical island, either. Hahaha.$h"
"Can you believe this place? It's teeming with exotic life!"
"It's a good specimen, but a very common species. You can keep it."
"Fruit and salt? What an odd combination...$s"
"Robin won't even tell *me* who paid for Pam's new house!#$e#I pretend I'm mad at her but secretly I'm glad she's so loyal to her word...$h"
"Maru helps me out in the lab sometimes... She's a good kid."
"It's hard to do good science without Maru's help...#$b#But her happiness is much more important than my experiment!"
"This valley has a very vibrant and diverse ecosystem. That's one reason I was excited to move here."
"You're probably growing a lot of interesting plants on your farm, huh?#$e#Maybe I'll stop by your place some day and check it out."
"How's the farming business going? It's parsnip season, isn't it?#$e#I can imagine it being pretty peaceful, working outdoors with plants all day."
"Robin has a hot temper. It's better to stay on her good side.#$e#Don't tell her I said that.$h"
"Let's see... If compounds in the rhizosphere contain sufficient levels of Carbon-13, then...$u#$b#Oh! Sorry. I was pondering some data and I didn't notice you there.#$e#Do you need anything?"
"It's good to take a break from work every now and then.#$e#I guess that's kind of difficult when you live on a farm, though.#$e#Hey, at least in the winter you don't have to worry about crops."
"Robin has a hot temper. It's better to stay on her good side.#$e#...now if I could only quantify her mood levels, perhaps I could model the fluctuations using a sinusoidal curve...$u"
"Hi @! How are you doing today?#$e#I wish I could make your farming job easier somehow."
"Really? I figured a farmer would know the correct answer...$s"
"See? @ agrees with me."
"Well, we'd better titrate this solution before it crystallizes on us."
"*sigh*... %fork$4"
"#$e#%Demetrius is deep in thought.#$e#Sorry, I'm really busy.#$e#There's so many plants to study right now."
"Make sure to water your plants every day.#$e#Although, if you're using water retaining soil you don't need to worry about watering as often.#$e#It's pretty convenient."
"How's the farming business going? It's tomato season, isn't it?#$e#I can imagine it being pretty peaceful, working outdoors with plants all day."
"$p 40#So I heard Maru had you look through that telescope out back.|If you and Maru become friends, I'm sure she'll show you how to use that telescope out back.#$e#Pretty exciting, huh?"
"I hope my daughter's keeping up on her math and science!"

"Hmm... If strigolactone levels could be increased, would it have a proportional effect on mycorhizal growth?$u#$b#Oh! Sorry. I was pondering some data and I didn't notice you there.#$e#Do you need anything?"
"I became a scientist because I wanted to contribute to the progression of our species.#$e#Of course, none of this would be possible without farmers such as yourself.$h"
"During this time of year I divert my attentions to fungi."
"We know a lot about nature thanks to science.#$e#But there's always a lot more to learn."
"How's the farming business going? It's corn season, isn't it?#$e#I can imagine it being pretty peaceful, working outdoors with plants all day."
"Maru sure spends a lot of time working on those gadgets of hers.#$e#I'm glad she's so dedicated."
"I'm still flabbergasted about Maru's secret robot... was it all a dream?"
"Let's see... perhaps the nitrogen fixation level is affected by nematode secretions...$u#$b#Oh! Sorry. I was pondering some data and I didn't notice you there.#$e#Do you need anything?"
"Hi @. I'm always glad when you come for a visit.#$e#It's nice to have some company after all this lonely lab-work."
"I'm taking a break from my research right now."
"Talk to my wife if you want to increase the size of your house."
"Do you have a kitchen in your house yet?#$e#Cooking is kind of like doing lab work."
"Do you have any animals on your farm?"
"Hello.#$e#%Demetrius seems lost in thought."
"Let's see... if seasonal nitrogen levels could be modeled by a piecewise function...$u#$b#Oh! Sorry. I was analyzing data and I didn't notice you there.#$e#Do you need anything?"
"Feel free to harvest as much lumber and stone from this area as you please."
"Thanks for stopping by. I need to think about something other than legumes for a while.#$e#So, what have you been doing lately?#$e#That sounds interesting."
